card1.title: Magnetic Muscle Stimulation
card1.caption: Through MMS technology, autologous muscles can obtain unprecedented exercise results with continuous expansion and contraction, which efficiently impacts and reshapes the internal structure of muscle tissue. MMS promotes the growth of myofibrils (muscle enlargement) and produces new protein chains and muscle fibers (muscle hyperplasia) as well as increases muscle density and volume.

card2.title: Result
card2.caption: When using MMS technology, the intensified muscle contractions causes also accelerated fatty acid decomposition and outflow of lipids from the destroyed fat cells. The released lipids will be converted into blood sugar during the following few weeks, and this way evacuated by normal metabolism. MMS strengthens and increases muscle tissue, whilst simultaneously destroys unwanted fat deposits from the treated are. This is a first time we have such a treatment option available.
